tool.name: SAGA.grid_visualisation.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayASPECT False isArraySLOPE False output_data_ASPECT_SLOPE $output_data_ASPECT_SLOPE output_data_LUT $output_data_LUT name SAGA.grid_visualisation.7 ASPECT $ASPECT SLOPE $SLOPE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_ASPECT_SLOPE $OutputSection_ASPECT_SLOPE.outputType_ASPECT_SLOPE transmissionMode_ASPECT_SLOPE $OutputSection_ASPECT_SLOPE.transmissionMode_ASPECT_SLOPE outputType_LUT $OutputSection_LUT.outputType_LUT transmissionMode_LUT $OutputSection_LUT.transmissionMode_LUT

param.name: ASPECT
param.label: Aspect
param.help: Aspect grid, in radians and 360 degree from north. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: SLOPE
param.label: Slope
param.help: Slope grid, in radians. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_ASPECT_SLOPE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_ASPECT_SLOPE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_LUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_LUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool creates an aspect-slope map which shows both the aspect and the slope of the terrain. Aspect is symbolized by different hues, while slope is mapped with saturation.<br/><br/>References:<br/>Brewer, C.A. & Marlow, K.A. (1993): Color Representation of Aspect and Slope simultaneously. Proceedings, Eleventh International Symposium on Computer-Assisted Cartography (Auto-Carto-11), Minneapolis, October/November 1993, pp. 328-337.<br/><a href="http://www.personal.psu.edu/cab38/Terrain/AutoCarto.html">http://www.personal.psu.edu/cab38/Terrain/AutoCarto.html</a><br/><br/><br/><a href="http://blogs.esri.com/esri/arcgis/2008/05/23/aspect-slope-map/">http://blogs.esri.com/esri/arcgis/2008/05/23/aspect-slope-map/</a><br/>
